content.question: public static String recur(int val) { String dig = "" + (val % 3); if (val / 3 > 0) return dig + recur(val / 3); return dig; } What is printed as a result of executing the following statement? System.out.println(recur(32));

skill.text: 3.C: Determine the result or output based on code that contains procedural abstractions.
